ph.ph: Deferred Tax related to Assets and Liabilities arising from a Single Transaction

body.p: Deferred Tax related to Assets and Liabilities arising from a Single Transaction amends IAS 12 Income Taxes. The amendments narrowed the scope of the recognition exemption in paragraphs 15 and 24 of IAS 12 so that it no longer applies to transactions that, on initial recognition, give rise to equal taxable and deductible temporary differences. The amendments apply to transactions such as leases and decommissioning obligations.
